name: Shape Escape (itch) (DarkWolf Studios)
description:
The Shape Escape  is a game that takes the idea of a metroidvania and turns it into more of a puzzling platformer. However the ability to change your shape allows for different effects by that shape. Please leave your feedback for this game in the discussion board below, I would love to improve my skills. This Game was created with one person and a few tutorials but I made it my very own.

Movement is A and D,  Space is Jump (Can be Bugged), W, S, E Change shape.

Music By Benjamin Tissot - Sad Day

A Few Sound effects from Free websites
